entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
